name: Starship 43 - The Last Astronaut VR
description:
In this indie sci-fi FPS action game, designed for virtual reality gameplay, you play as a highly trained astronaut on a mission to investigate a malfunctioning satellite in space. Your task is to enter Starship 43 and restore communication with Earth by sending a critical message. However, things are not as they seem, and you quickly realize that there are dangerous threats lurking within the station.

As you navigate through the station, you'll need to use stealth to avoid detection from the unknown entities that have taken over the satellite. The game features intense FPS combat as you fight to survive against the hostile enemies and complete your mission. Along the way, you'll need to solve puzzles and overcome obstacles to progress through the station.

The game offers a unique sci-fi setting, where you'll experience the isolation and vastness of space, all while facing the challenges of a dangerous and unpredictable environment. As you uncover the secrets of Starship 43, you'll need to use all your skills and abilities to survive and complete your mission. Can you save humanity and restore communication with Earth? Play now to find out.
